snippet: Djokovic dispatched Tomas Berdych on Friday in his final round-robin match of the ATP tournament in London to reach the semifinals and also secure the year-end No. 1 ranking.
abstract: Christopher Clarey On Tennis column observes that Novak Djokovic has secured the No 1 ranking in men's tennis for the third time in the last four seasons; holds that while Djokovic still trails Roger Federer and Rafael Nadal in career achievement and global recognition, he is running a very strong third.
lead_paragraph: Djokovic dispatched Tomas Berdych on Friday in his final round-robin match of the ATP tournament in London to reach the semifinals and also secure the year-end No. 1 ranking.

headline.main: Work to Do, but Novak Djokovic Sews Up Top Year-End Ranking
headline.print_headline: Work to Do, but Djokovic Sews Up Top Year-End Ranking
